name: Sword and Shadow
description: This is a moba type game. In the game, players can choose one of five different characters and destroy the enemy crystals to win. The game provides a variety of weapons, players can buy equivalent weapons according to their money reserves, or sell weapons. Players can kill enemy minions or enemy characters to gain money, and even if they don't kill enemy minions or enemy heroes, the money will continue to increase over time. In addition, this game can be used for LAN battles, come and play with your friends.
